<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">7232625c102202108a73a9321dc321d1</macroponent><name>Conditionally refresh special handing notes data broker</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {
    const { name } = event.payload;
    if (name != 'activityLogs')
        return;

    const activityLogsMap = api.context.props.activityLogs;
    if (activityLogsMap.size === 0)
        return;

    var activityEntries = Array.from(activityLogsMap.values());

    //Only fetch the lastest activity entry
    const activityEntry = activityEntries[activityEntries.length - 1];
    const activityArray = activityEntry.activities.get('crud');
    if (activityArray.length === 0)
        return;

    const SHNDisplayed = api.state.specialHandlingNotesDisplayed;
    const isActiveScreen = api.context.props.screen.isActive;
    //Refresh Special Handing Notes only when it's not displayed before and current screen is active
    if (SHNDisplayed || !isActiveScreen)
        return;

    //Only fetch the lastest operation
    const { operation } = activityArray[activityArray.length - 1];
    if (operation === 'inserted' || operation === 'updated') {
        api.data.get_special_handling_notes.refresh();
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>7632625c412202105b3191fccbfecab8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Conditionally refresh special handing notes data broker</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_7632625c412202105b3191fccbfecab8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:36</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
